div68kCycleAccurate is used by Steem's CPU emulation


Pasti = Protected Atari ST Interface

The pasti.dll here was downloaded from atari-forum.
It seems not to be available at http://pasti.fxatari.com/
It is version 03a2.

pasti.h has been modified to handle a 64bit of pasti.dll, but this doesn't exist yet
